# counterClockwise

**Instance Property**

Returns a copy of the effect requesting an animation that rotates back and forth, starting by rotating counter-clockwise.

## Declaration

```swift
var counterClockwise: WiggleSymbolEffect { get }
```
title: counterClockwise
